content: The Mother of Flamlings is a stationary boss, which you would think would make the battle easier. Unfortunately, though, summoning the Mother of Flamlings also summons several other Flamlings who will hurl fireballs at you throughout the entire fight.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mother_of_Flamlings_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Mother of Flamlings Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Mother of Flamlings Fight'.
The content is as follows:
The Mother of Flamlings is a stationary boss, which you would think would make the battle easier. Unfortunately, though, summoning the Mother of Flamlings also summons several other Flamlings who will hurl fireballs at you throughout the entire fight.
